name: Colors, a puzzle game [Epitech Berlin]
description:
In Colors, you'll have to solve different puzzles. To solve them, each character must reach the exit. So you'll make every character working with each other to complete the puzzles because within diversity we can do better things!

Instructions
  •  Q, D = Move
  • Space = Jump 
  •  A, E = Switch character
  •  R = Restart level 
  •  F = Interact
  • ESC = Pause
Credits
  • Romain Kania
  • William Wanty 
  • Hadrien Goutas
